753.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy, Community Rules, and Terms of Service
753.quoteText:
No sale of personal information

LibraryThing will not sell or give personally-identifiable information to any third party. This would be evil, and we are not evil. Yes, still.
753.title: Will not sell your data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data
tosdr.tldr: LibraryThing will not sell or give personally-identifiable information to any third party.

9683.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy, Community Rules, and Terms of Service
9683.quoteText: LibraryThing will not cooperate with non-US law enforcement unless compelled, or if we are convinced the law is at least as just, and applied as justly, as US standards.
9683.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

tosdr.case: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

9684.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy, Community Rules, and Terms of Service
9684.quoteText: As of June 30, 2020, we have never received a National Security Letter, FISA order, or any other classified request for user information.
9684.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

9685.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy, Community Rules, and Terms of Service
9685.quoteText: LibraryThing staff are empowered to admonish, warn, suspend, and ban users for violations of these terms. We are happy to talk things through, but our decisions are final.
9685.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

9686.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy, Community Rules, and Terms of Service
9686.quoteText: We do NOT assert copyright over the things you post to LibraryThing. The phrase "non-exclusive" above means you can post your content elsewhere. By posting something to LibraryThing you let us use it, but you do not restrict what you can do with it.
9686.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

9689.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy, Community Rules, and Terms of Service
9689.quoteText: Do not upload X-rated or otherwise highly objectionable pictures.
9689.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
